summary: Provides a comprehensive unit‑test suite for the NLocal and TwoLocal quantum circuit classes, checking their construction, layer addition, entanglement patterns, repetition handling, parameter access, circuit composition, layout variations, and equivalence to expected behaviours.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the n‑local circuit implementations in the quantum computing library, enabling developers and users to rely on these components when building and testing quantum algorithms.
